title: WorkView Android and iOS App Development
desc: Completed existing iOS app development and developed Android app from scratch along with .NET Web API backend for WorkView, LLC.

title: AWS Cost and Usage Data Aggregation for Web Application Consumption and Analytics
desc: Created ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) pySpark application to aggregate hundreds of GBs of data, so they are fast enough to be queried by web application.

title: CloudSaver Visual Studio Extension
desc: Developed Visual Studio Extension for CloudSaver developers to change local connection to remote environment, decrypt encrypted string, and perform local database schema migration.

title: Web Page for Single Sign-On (SSO) Configuration
desc: Enabled customer to configure authentication via SSO into company's web application.

title: Gentle Heart Company (GHC) Nepal
desc: Helping a non-profit in Nepal to setup their WordPress site with e-commerce and e-booking.

title: Cloudsaver Connection CLI
desc: Created Connection CLI application to perform integration between Cloudsaver app and cloud providers.

title: Upgrade Xen Hypervisor-based EC2 Instance to Nitro-based Instance Programmatically
desc: Update app to create a feature to enable Xen to Nitro upgrade

title: Upgrade from PV virtualization to HVM for EC2 AMI programmatically
desc: App feature to upgrade virtualization from PV to HVM.

title: Streamline Monthly Report Generation
desc: Update application to reduce report generation for 6 board from one week to 24 boards in few hours.

title: Git Cleanup Every 90 Days
desc: Script to help clean up Git branches older than 90 days.

title: Implement Scrolling in Silverlight Image Viewer
desc: Helped sales department to make customers happy by enabling scrolling on Silvelight image viewer plugin.

title: Downsize EBS Programmatically
desc: App feature to resize existing EBS by moving data to smaller EBS.
